'''Bluethunder Weasel''' is a type of beast that can be found in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines|The Chasm]], [[Liyue]]. When killed, it will restore 1 energy to the [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Bluethunder Weasels are found exclusively in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/9?shown_types=351 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
